import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' function DeliveryScreen() { const navigate = useNavigate() const location = useLocation() const [address, setAddress] = useState('') const [town, setTown] = useState('') const [city, setCity] = useState('') const [county, setCounty] = useState('') const [postcode, setPostcode] = useState('') const [country, setCountry] = useState('') const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Submitted') } return (

Delivery

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} > Town setTown(e.target.value)} > City setCity(e.target.value)} > County setCounty(e.target.value)} > Address setPostcode(e.target.value)} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} >
) } export default DeliveryScreen;
